org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.shader

Class VFShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.shader.Shader
      • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.shader.VFShader

  • public class VFShader
extends Shader

    Implements a simple Shader. Includes a Vertex Shader and a Fragment Shader. Compiles GLSL from source. Supports Uniforms

    Author:
    CDnoMlqko
